entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13.
